name: Transforming Robot Ball War
description:
The robot world is in need of a Transforming robot ball simulator once again!! In the nick of the time from out of nowhere the enemy robots have conquered the city and won’t spare the citizens of the city. They claim that your city, for which you are the rightful hero simulator, will belong to them once they destroy everything!!

Gear up for a futuristic robot battle as you go face to face with enemy robots that are out there to get your people and your city!! The atmosphere is about to turn in to a city war where everyone’s life is on the line. The only hope now for the people is none other than the hero simulator futuristic armor super robot!!! 

The game displays the image of a city atmosphere which belongs to the futuristic super robot hero simulator and his people!! The atmosphere shows a long and endless road of the attack city which is under enemy robot threat and you have to make sure the threat disappears by being the transforming robot ball simulator!! 
In the game your converter robot is the only robot with the special power to convert in to a gigantic and fierce robot ball which can easily trample the enemy simulator in just one swipe!! 

So download this game right now and save your city from city war, war simulator which is about to fiercely take place!! Continue the rounds of trampling as the levels proceed; each level consists of new and different enemy robots with new attacks and surprises each level!!
Once the futuristic game starts, your hero simulator makes a run for saviour!! Then convert in to a robot ball, and jump over all the enemy simulator you find to get rid of them!! Be careful of the environment, don’t hurt the citizens!! 

The futuristic ball runs on controls which are present on screen making it easier and convenient for you to control your robot ball! There are stunts which can be performed and also speed ups come with strategic game play!! Find your enemy targets and let the attack city war begin!!
Each level unlocks new kinds of futuristic attack balls making the hero simulator stronger than ever!!

*** HOW TO PLAY THE GAME ***
• Start 
• Select level 
• Select the robot ball
• Play 
• Begin the game play with the on screen joystick and controls 
• When the pace builds up convert into a huge ball
• When enemy comes in the way, use controls to jump on them 
• Defeat all enemy and proceed to next level

*** FEATURES OF THE GAME *** 
• Multiple levels 
• Multiple robots 
• On screen controls 
• High quality graphics 
• 3D simulation 
• Ball conversion simulation 
• Target based game 
• City war simulator atmosphere 
• Multiple attack controls and options 

Health and stamina bar on screen to update on current health status
